explains: n. 侵略，入侵；涌入，大批进入；侵犯，干预；侵袭，扩散
wordGroup: invasion of privacy 侵犯个人隐私；侵犯隐私权

sentences.en: There was widespread condemnation of the invasion.
sentences.cn: 那次侵略遭到了人们普遍的谴责。

sentences.en: Since the U.S. invasion the president's reputation has nosedived.
sentences.cn: 自从美国入侵以来，这位总统的声誉一落千丈。

sentences.en: The actress described the photographs of her as an invasion of privacy.
sentences.cn: 那位女演员认为她的这些照片是对隐私权的侵犯。
